Category:The Legends of Luke Skywalker—The Manga

nodes.text: The Legends of Luke Skywalker—The Manga

The Legends of Luke Skywalker—The Manga is an English manga that adapts the Ken Liu novel of the same name. The manga is comprised of the stories "The Starship Graveyard," by Akira Fukaya and Takashi Kisaki; "I, Droid," by Haruichi; "The Tale of Lugubrious Mote," by Subaru; and "Big Inside," by Akira Himekawa. It was published on January 14, 2020 by Viz Media.
The collection does not include the framing stories of the starship stowaways telling the tales.

Who is Luke Skywalker? Across the galaxies many have heard his name, but few have met the legendary Jedi. There are those who call him a merciless war criminal—others say he's not even a human, but a droid! Whether he is man or myth, those who claim they've encountered the elusive Luke Skywalker have an unforgettable adventure to share.
Star Wars: The Legends of Luke Skywalker pairs powerhouse Japanese manga creators with inspiring myths about the iconic Jedi Knight, adapted from the novel by best-selling author Ken Liu.
